testcase.name: Authentication > POST /api/auth/login > returns 400 if username or password missing

failure.message: expected { code: 'VALIDATION_ERROR', …(2) } to be 'Username and password required' // Object.is equality

testcase.name: Authentication > POST /api/auth/login > returns 401 for invalid credentials
Authentication > POST /api/auth/login > validates login endpoint exists and handles requests
Authentication > GET /api/auth/session > returns authenticated: false when not logged in
Authentication > GET /api/auth/session > validates session endpoint works correctly
Authentication > Protected Routes > blocks access to protected routes when not logged in
Authentication > Protected Routes > verifies master-only route requires authentication
